description: The course is an advanced study of the law relating to corporate insolvency. The course will explore winding up, the concept of insolvency, voidable transactions, the interaction of liquidation and receivership, receivers and other controllers, voluntary administrations, deeds of company arrangements and formal schemes of arrangements.
restricted:
LLM, LLM(Adv); LLM(#16), LLM(#24); MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
